评论概述: Buy this. Functional meets confidence boost.
评论详情: I'm a plus-sized pear shape (5'5", L in tops, 14 or 16 in bottoms), I ordered an XL in khaki, and MAN do I feel like a million bucks when I put this on. I bought it for a resort vacation. I tried a few others before selecting this one and none compare. The quality is perfect. It's lightweight, soft, came with no snags or imperfections, and does not wrinkle. The color is a true khaki, it pairs beautifully with everything, and it compliments tanned skin. The shape is everything. The lower v-neckline is not too low, the straps are not at all bulky but are still just wide enough to cover thicker swimsuit straps, and the weave is opaque enough to help you feel covered. The shape is extremely flattering even with hips, a tummy, and a bum. It has two subtle slits on the sides and reaches mid-thigh on me. It makes you feel put together, looks fitting as resort wear, but would also be perfect for a pool day with the kids. At the first sight of mine showing wear, I'll be repurchasing for sure.

评论概述: Fantastic Swimsuit Cover-Up - Stylish, Comfortable, and Practical!
评论详情: I recently purchased this swimsuit cover-up, and it has quickly become my favorite beach and poolside accessory. The design is absolutely stunning. It’s chic and stylish, making me feel fashionable and confident whenever I wear it. The comfort level is exceptional. The fabric is soft, lightweight, and breathable, making it perfect for hot summer days. It drapes beautifully and feels gentle against the skin, providing the right amount of coverage without feeling heavy or restrictive. The quality of the material and craftsmanship is outstanding. The stitching is durable, and the fabric holds up well to frequent use and washing. Even after multiple wears, it still looks and feels like new. The fit is flattering and true to size.  This cover-up is perfect for travel. It’s lightweight and folds up compactly, making it easy to pack in a suitcase or beach bag without taking up much space. It’s a must-have for any vacation. For the quality and versatility, this cover-up is an excellent value. It’s a stylish and practical addition to my swimwear collection, and I can’t imagine hitting the beach or pool without it! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-quality cover-up. You won’t be disappointed!

I bought this coverup in white and also in black. On my body shape and size, I thought the neckline, straps, and length were perfect and this coverup made me feel pretty. I am 5'5" and am wearing the large size. You can’t beat the price and they washed well on a cold, gentle cycle and then I hung them to dry. I might buy another color or two for variety and also because it can be a bit of a challenge to find a swim coverup that comes down low enough to not make you feel like you’re showing everything to the world. Don’t pass this one up!
This cover-up is so easy, and dries fast! I  love the was it flows! It’s is perfect!!!
